author: Peter Goff
title: In China Covid-19 leaves social upheaval in its wake
description: Beijing Letter: With global markets in disarray, Chinese firms turn to domestic consumer
content:
As people across China take tentative steps towards a new normality after two months of national trauma, the world they assess has been reshaped. Entering a state of flux, relationships are changing.
For some, this relationship change involves ending marriag… [+4437 chars]
